A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is an absolute insult to all star wars fans. Trashes on everything that J.J set up in the force awakens. The writing\, directing and acting is abysmal\, as is the editing. This movie has no flow\, it is all over the place with ridiculous plots that could have been cool and purposeful had they been written better\, but ultimately it is a 2.5hr long cat and mouse chase that has no pay off. i went to the midnight screening excited as to see this. I have waited 2 years and I have been completely let down. I am gutted. What a pile of turds. There were a couple of cool moments that I really enjoyed\, but ultimately this movie fails. I don't even care for episode 9 now\, I am just so disappointed by this movie\, such a disgrace. Watch at your own risk. it definitely will not go the way that you think.\n1.5/5
